offered_by: All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE)
target_group: Orphans, Wards of Martyrs, Covid-affected families
introduction: The Swanath Scholarship is a special scheme to provide financial support to orphans, wards of parents who died due to COVID-19, and wards of Armed Forces/Central Paramilitary Forces martyred in action.

category: Both parents died due to COVID-19
eligibility_criteria.academic: Enrolled in AICTE approved Degree or Diploma institution

scholarship_benefits.duration: For every year of study (Max 4 years for Degree, 3 years for Diploma)

steps: Apply under AICTE Schemes -> Swanath Scholarship
